name: Codecov Enterprise
description: Continuous Code Coverage - Privately Hosted Enterprise Edition

ENTERPRISE_LICENSE.description: License key provided by Codecov staff.

CODECOV_URL.description: Please type in the Heroku url for this app. Ex. https://your-enterprise.herokuapp.com

GITHUB_ORGANIZATIONS.description: Users must be a member of at least one organization in list, ex. hello,myteam,mycompany

COOKIE_SECRET.description: Used for encoding active user cookies
